aboutpara: My journey started during MySpace years, I loved adding new pieces of code to my page and liked seeing the changes on the browser, however, I didn't know I could do that as a career. I have been studying web development on my own for about 3 years and completed task work such as Udemy courses, Code academy, etc. I joined Lambda School and my knowledge of computer science and software engineering accelerated and gave me the confidence to work for myself. Today, I currently am a Freelance ReachJS contractor always looking for challenging roles and projects. I am continuing my studies of tech, there is always something new to learn, currently studying design and data science.  Outside of coding, I like to use my hands to get crafty and paint, I am not picasso but it helps relieve stress and it is relaxing. I am a father to a one year old and I truly love being a father, including the changing diapers part. I also enjoy traveling and taking pictures of different architecture structures.
name: Luis

resume.description: Experienced Software Engineer with over 5 years of expertise in JavaScript and React. Passionate about web performance, creating beautiful and usable interfaces, and solving customer needs creatively

experiences.bullets: Led the development and enhancement of the SaaS customer-facing web application achieving a 30% performance improvement and significant bug reduction., Spearheaded UI/UX component improvements using React/Typescript/Redux/SCSS/MaterialUI and AWS to optimize user experience and dashboard features., Established and enforced development standards/practices and tooling to improve code quality and developer productivity., Mentored and supported engineers promoting best practices and aiding their technical growth., Collaborated closely with the Director of Product and cross-functional teams for feature planning and product enhancements.,Conducted thorough testing-wrote unit/integration tests and optimized web applications for maximum speed/scalability across various devices and browsers., Established and enforced development standards/practices/tooling to improve code quality and developer productivity.

Full-stack engineer focused on developing efficient/reusable and reliable code with an emphasis on testing.,Led the conversion of Vue.js frontend codebase to React.js improving UI and performance., Handled both RDBMS (MySQL) and NoSQL (MongoDB) operations including table creation/indexing/writing queries and performance troubleshooting.
experiences.position: Full Stack Software Engineer at Hugo Health

experiences.bullets: Engineered and built new user interfaces using React/JavaScript/HTML and CSS resulting in customized UIs that increased conversion rates by 40%.,Ensured web application's cross-browser compatibility leading to 30% faster load times., Created documentation for efficient reusable code/UI components and participated in code reviews with a collaborative team., Mentored and participated in pair programming with junior developers.
experiences.position: Frontend Developer Contractor at Bobo, LLC

experiences.bullets: Collaborated with the development team to create a web-based application that helped users manage their plans/see plan benefits and search for providers and find user claims.,Created graphics and designed app layouts from scratch in Adobe Photoshop/Illustrator and InDesign,Built app UX prototypes using HTML/CSS and JavaScript.,Designed and implemented user interface schematics/functional prototypes/workflows and information architecture documents., Upgraded advertising content for mailed letters and brochures and online user accounts leading to 45% percent increase in new membership enrollment compared to the previous quarter.
experiences.position: Web Developer at CarePlus Health Plans
